name: EvidenceOfBilateralOophorectomy
title: Evidence of Bilateral Oophorectomy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for evidence of bilateral oophorectomy.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for a unilateral oophorectomy of a solitary remaining ovary.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent procedures for a bilateral oophorectomy or for a unilateral oophorectomy for which the status of the other ovary is not specified.)

contains.display: Laparoscopic left oophorectomy after prior right oophorectomy (procedure)

Laparoscopic left salpingo-oophorectomy after prior right salpingo-oophorectomy (procedure)
